text: Hara Pattanaik (, 12 October 1958 â€“ 13 January 2015) was an Indian movie actor, director and screenplay writer. He has acted over 60 Oriya movies and directed about 19 others. Patnaik was known for his roles in Sathire (2004), Ganga Jamuna (1997) and Nari Bi Pindhipare Rakta Sindura (1997). Parranaik died on 13 January 2015 of cancer. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1958 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian movie directors
